phrase.item: I came to the entrance, Nuqra had a dress made of qunowiz [a kind of fabric] on her. She saw me and ran away.
I sacrifice myself for you, and sacrifice myself for your father's house.
I watered the beans, Nuqra came out of the house.
Kiss me just once.
I sacrifice myself for you.
On your house there is ephedra [shrub], this girl has golden teeth.
I couldn't sleep at night.
I sacrifice myself for you.
There is a sapling above your house, this girl has a thousand dreams, at night I will jump into your bed.
I sarcrifice myself for you.
There are two pumpkins above your house, oh girl don't deceive me.
You cover me with a blanket.
I sacrifice myself for you.
I went to the high water channel, I remembered that girl.
I became round and rolled down the water channel.
I sacrifice myself for you.
There is a chring-pring [onomatopoeia] on your chest, I have burned because of you.
Golden binoculars in your hand,
I sacrifice myself for you.
The girl was on the roof, she hid herself when she saw me.
My liver split,
I sacrifice myself for you.
The sweet flower is in the marsh, in her hand she has two round onions.
When she saw me, she was full of vanity.
I sacrifice myself for you.
